thread.title: Mariah Carey torches wedding dress in new music video
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey torches wedding dress in new music video

title: Mariah Carey torches wedding dress in new music video
text:
Mariah Carey torches wedding dress in new music video By nine.com.au staff 
Mariah Carey’s split with billionaire James Packer has been given the music video treatment, with the diva setting fire to a wedding dress in her latest track. 
The 46-year-old singer’s breakup song "I Don’t" had its debut yesterday and she doesn’t shy away from letting the world know her feelings. 
The most telling scene comes towards the end of the video after the extensive scenes of her wearing nothing but lingerie. 
Carey carries a wedding dress that gets hurled straight into a fire. 
TMZ claims it was the same $250,000 dress she would have worn on her actual wedding day before the public split with Packer. 
The clip ends with the charred embers of the white gown simmering on the ground. 
"Ever since the tour wrapped I took some time just to process my feelings and I started writing a song to express what I've been going through," Carey said. 
"And if you're not getting the love that you need from someone that you're supposed to be in a real relationship with, then why remain in that situation?" © Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017 TRENDING VIDEO 9RAW: Tech company unveils 'nightmare-inducing' robots Boston Dynamics, owned by Google’s Alphabet, has showcased a new range of bipedal and quadrupedal robots that have been labelled as “nightmare-inducing” by founder Marc Raibert.
